title: The Story of God
description:
We all need to know the story of God from creation to heaven. Why are we here? Why did God make us? What is sin? I can't wait to share this special set of books I wrote when my kids were little and now we've made them for you.

Use code PODCAST to get free shipping on my 5-book series for kids called the Story of God. (For single set, US orders only) >>> theolaby.com
